alert.note: Alert for Gray; Hemphill; Roberts; Wheeler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 1:30AM CDT until July 09 at 2:15AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 AM CDT FOR WHEELER...GRAY...ROBERTS AND HEMPHILL COUNTIES... At 130 AM CDT, automated weather equipment reported severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles north of Durham to 6 miles north of New Mobeetie to 3 miles southwest of Pampa, moving southeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Automated weather equipment. At 122 AM CDT, a 63 mph was recorded 6 miles east of Canadian. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Locations impacted include... Pampa, Canadian, Shamrock, Miami, Briscoe, Wheeler, Mclean, Lefors, New Mobeetie, Lake Mcclellan, Twitty, Allison, Lela, Glazier, Lake Marvin, Kellerville, Lora, Alanreed, Codman and Mobeetie. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
